LanguageData.USCM_Xenomorph.label: Xenomorph
LanguageData.USCM_Xenomorph.description: Xenomorphs are the ultimate killer. No feelings, no remorses, no mercy.
LanguageData.USCM_Xenomorph.tools.0.label: inner jaw
LanguageData.USCM_Xenomorph.tools.1.label: left hand
LanguageData.USCM_Xenomorph.tools.2.label: right hand
LanguageData.USCM_Xenomorph.tools.3.label: tail
LanguageData.USCM_Runner_Xenomorph.label: Xenomorph
LanguageData.USCM_Runner_Xenomorph.description: Runners are Xenormorph born from a common animal host. They run fast, beware...
LanguageData.USCM_Runner_Xenomorph.tools.0.label: inner jaw
LanguageData.USCM_Runner_Xenomorph.tools.1.label: left hand

LanguageData.USCM_Drone_Xenomorph.label: Xenomorph
LanguageData.USCM_Drone_Xenomorph.description: Drones are Xenormorph born from a human host. They are smart and deadly efficient at killing.
LanguageData.USCM_Drone_Xenomorph.tools.0.label: inner jaw

LanguageData.USCM_Praetorian_Xenomorph.label: Xenomorph
LanguageData.USCM_Praetorian_Xenomorph.description: The praetorian Xenomorph is as deadly as a tank. Except this thing is actually alive and smart.

LanguageData.USCM_Queen_Xenomorph.label: Xenomorph
LanguageData.USCM_Queen_Xenomorph.description: She is big, angry and definitely going to hurt your colonists really bad.
